languages.text: "Значит, они встречают смерть с распростертыми объятиями, как и должно. Удивительно, что мирянам обычно надо испытать страдания, дабы узреть, что истинная свобода не в жизни, а в ее завершении".

"So, they welcome death with open arms here, as they should. It still surprises me that most laypeople need to experience torment before they can see that true freedom lies not in life, but at its end."
languages.original_text: "Значит, они встречают смерть с распростертыми объятиями, как и должно. Удивительно, что мирянам обычно надо испытать страдания, дабы узреть, что истинная свобода не в жизни, а в ее завершении".

traits.locale_text: "So, they welcome death with open arms here, as they should. It still surprises me that most laypeople need to experience torment before they can see that true freedom lies not in life, but at its end."

"So, they welcome death with open arms here, as they should. It still surprises me that most laypeople need to experience torment before they can see that true freedom lies not in life, but at its end."

"So, they welcome death with open arms here, as they should. It still surprises me that most laypeople need to experience torment before they can see that true freedom lies not in life, but at its end."
"Now you see why the Undying One sends His servants to bestow mercy upon those who are tired of toils beyond their limit."

"So, they welcome death with open arms here, as they should. It still surprises me that most laypeople need to experience torment before they can see that true freedom lies not in life, but at its end."

languages.text: Sie begrüßen den Tod hier also mit offenen Armen, genau, wie es sein sollte. Es überrascht mich dennoch, dass die meisten Laien gefoltert werden müssen, ehe sie erkennen, dass wahre Freiheit nicht im Leben, sondern an dessen Ende zu finden ist.
languages.original_text: "So, they welcome death with open arms here, as they should. It still surprises me that most laypeople need to experience torment before they can see that true freedom lies not in life, but at its end."

traits.locale_text: Sie begrüßen den Tod hier also mit offenen Armen, genau, wie es sein sollte. Es überrascht mich dennoch, dass die meisten Laien gefoltert werden müssen, ehe sie erkennen, dass wahre Freiheit nicht im Leben, sondern an dessen Ende zu finden ist.
"Nun seht Ihr, warum der Todlose Seine Diener entsendet, um jenen Gnade zu gewähren, die es leid sind, immerfort zu dienen."

languages.text: « Ainsi, ces gens accueillent la mort à bras ouverts, comme il se doit. Je suis toujours surprise de constater que la plupart des profanes ont besoin de souffrir le martyre pour se rendre compte que la véritable liberté ne réside pas dans la vie, mais dans l'instant où elle prend fin. »
languages.original_text: "So, they welcome death with open arms here, as they should. It still surprises me that most laypeople need to experience torment before they can see that true freedom lies not in life, but at its end."

traits.locale_text: « Ainsi, ces gens accueillent la mort à bras ouverts, comme il se doit. Je suis toujours surprise de constater que la plupart des profanes ont besoin de souffrir le martyre pour se rendre compte que la véritable liberté ne réside pas dans la vie, mais dans l'instant où elle prend fin. »
« Maintenant, vous voyez pourquoi l'Immortel dépêche Ses serviteurs pour accorder une mort miséricordieuse aux malheureux qui s'épuisent à la tâche. »

languages.text: «Ahora esperan a la muerte con los brazos abiertos, como debe ser. Todavía me sorprende que la mayoría de laicos tengan que experimentar el tormento para saber que la verdadera libertad no yace en la vida, sino en la muerte».
languages.original_text: "So, they welcome death with open arms here, as they should. It still surprises me that most laypeople need to experience torment before they can see that true freedom lies not in life, but at its end."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora esperan a la muerte con los brazos abiertos, como debe ser. Todavía me sorprende que la mayoría de laicos tengan que experimentar el tormento para saber que la verdadera libertad no yace en la vida, sino en la muerte».
«Ahora ve por qué el Inmortal envía a Sus sirvientes a otorgar Su misericordia a quienes no pueden trabajar más».

languages.text: 「だから、彼らはここで当然のように死を受け入れる。ほとんどの人が苦悩を経験して初めて、真の自由は人生にではなく、その終わりにあるのだと自覚できないことに驚いている」
languages.original_text: "So, they welcome death with open arms here, as they should. It still surprises me that most laypeople need to experience torment before they can see that true freedom lies not in life, but at its end."

traits.locale_text: 「だから、彼らはここで当然のように死を受け入れる。ほとんどの人が苦悩を経験して初めて、真の自由は人生にではなく、その終わりにあるのだと自覚できないことに驚いている」
「なぜ不死の者が、限界を超えた労苦に疲れ切った人々に慈悲を与えるべく従者たちを遣わせるのか、その理由がわかったでしょう」

languages.text: “也就是说，他们张开双臂迎接死亡，这是他们应该做的事情。但令我感到惊讶的是，绝大多数教外人士只有在经历了痛苦之后，才能意识到真正的自由并不在生命之中，而是在生命的尽头。”
languages.original_text: "So, they welcome death with open arms here, as they should. It still surprises me that most laypeople need to experience torment before they can see that true freedom lies not in life, but at its end."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，他们张开双臂迎接死亡，这是他们应该做的事情。但令我感到惊讶的是，绝大多数教外人士只有在经历了痛苦之后，才能意识到真正的自由并不在生命之中，而是在生命的尽头。”
“现在你应该明白，为什么不死之神会派祂的仆人，为劳累过度之人带去怜悯了吧？”

languages.text: "Demek burada ölümü, tam da yapmaları gibi memnuniyetle karşılıyorlar. Çoğu avamın gerçek özgürlüğün yaşamda değil, yaşamın sonunda olduğunu görebilmesi için ızdırabı deneyimlemiş olmasının gerekmesi beni hâlâ şaşırtıyor."
languages.original_text: "So, they welcome death with open arms here, as they should. It still surprises me that most laypeople need to experience torment before they can see that true freedom lies not in life, but at its end."
